text:
Hey - apologies if there’s a way to do this already, but I haven’t been able to find out.

For NumberInputs, it would be super useful if we could either have access to an event that either registers button presses or a prebuilt increase/decrease by `step` based on arrow key inputs. Letting the user press the ArrowUp key to change 99999 to 100000 instead of having to erase and re-enter the number would be preferred.

I am testing out the various samples from  <https://github.com/HubSpot/ui-extensions-examples/> and I have found that the extension cards will not populate with content when I am connected to my VPN.  Any way around this besides disconnecting?
I also see this error whether I am connected to VPN or not - when not connected the extension card works fine but I still see this error on the console.  Anyone else get this?

Hi Magnus!
Does the UI of <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/ui-components/standard-components/stepper-input|StepperInput> help for what you're trying to achieve?
